description:
No need to keep an eye on the weather when you have the All-Weather hat on your head. Originally the Paddler's Hat, this sun, wind and rain hat has become a favourite for all outdoor activities. The Schoeller c_change membrane adapts to the ambient temperature to release heat when it's warm or seal in body heat when it's cold.

  • Durable Schoeller fabric has UPF 50+ sun protection and a DWR finish to shed light rain
  • Schoeller Fabric c_change® membrane helps regulate the temperature of your noggin
  • Foam brim snaps up to streamline in wind and floats if it falls in water
  • Brim is 7cm front and back, 6.5cm at sides
  • Underbrim colour reduces reflection and glare
  • Hidden crown pocket holds small essentials while travelling
  • Dual, reflective wind cord system keeps hat secure in gusty conditions
name: Tilley All Weather Hat - Unisex
